shared.model.bank

Class PlayerBank

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.bank.Bank
      • shared.model.bank.PlayerBank

  • public class PlayerBank
extends Bank
    Author:
    isaachartung The PlayerBank is a Bank with an extra Array of DevelopmentCards. This is necessary due to the game constraint that DevelopmentCards cannot be played on the same turn they are drawn. This class contains methods to manipulate this array.

      • clear

      • transfer

        public void transfer()
        Precondition:
        no preconditions
        Postcondition:
